derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English popig, papæg, from a medieval Latin alteration of Latin papaver

entry.def: A poppy is a plant with a large, delicate flower, usually red in colour. The drug opium is obtained from one type of poppy.

entry.tran: （英国每年11月某日为悼念两次世界大战的死难者而佩戴的）人造罂粟花
entry.def: In Britain, on a particular day in November, people wear an artificial poppy in memory of the people who died in the two world wars.

example.ex: She pinned the poppy to his raincoat.
example.tran: 她把罂粟花别在了他的雨衣上。
